titleStmt.title: A true copy of Sir Henry Hide's speech on the scaffold, immediately before his execution before the Exchange, on the 4th of March, 1650. Taken in short-hand from his mouth, by John Hinde.
titleStmt.author: Hyde, Henry, Sir, 1605 or 6-1651.
Hinde, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Cole, at the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil by the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
